memories.content: Waves 1-10 property/deal/document CRUD (2026-01-14). Market Data Pipeline: DB dashboard_market_data with 253K records (2026-02-05). ReportSettings + property transforms refactor + Zod validation (2026-02-07). Sales Analysis Dashboard: 10 endpoints, 6 visualizations, filter panel, 205 tests (2026-02-10). DealStage enum fix + deprecation cleanup (2026-02-10). Extraction Pipeline Review: 16 issues fixed (2026-02-11). Construction Pipeline COMPLETE: 5 DB tables, CoStar import, 6 API clients, scheduler, 15 endpoints, Leaflet map, 4 tabs (2026-02-11). UW Model Grouping Pipeline code COMPLETE: 6 new modules, 11 API endpoints, 137 tests (2026-02-11). Dashboard Multi-Page Fixes: Pipeline Map, delivery dates, interest rates live data, USA Market (2026-02-11). Real-Time Refresh + Scheduler Overhaul: force_refresh, InterestRateScheduler, FRED twice-daily (2026-02-12). UW Model Phase 3 Reference Mapping DATA COMPLETE: 30 groups validated, 2 with custom remaps. UW Model Phase 4 Extraction COMPLETE: field remaps, batch extraction, approval workflow, 51 new tests (2026-02-12). Technical Debt Cleanup (2026-02-12): reminder dismissals → DB persistence (migration d7d1ad81d3c0), removed unused medianPricePerUnit, E2E tests added (116 tests: construction, underwriting, sales-analysis). CI fixes: React hooks order. Latest commit: 1fe2d5b. Tests: 1590+ backend, 521 frontend, zero TS errors.

conda env: dashboard-backend. Backend port 8000, Frontend port 5173. Git: stash apply over pop, don't push unless asked. User prefers validation/testing before new features. Be extremely clear about required user actions. User prefers directness over hedging. NO mock data, NO fake data, NO silent fallbacks — show errors instead. Commit strategy: split by logical area, push when asked. Obsidian vault: 'Programming Vault' at /mnt/c/Users/MattBorgeson/Documents/Programming Vault/Dashboard Interface. User demands thorough validation — test ALL files, not just samples. Don't overclaim confidence without evidence. User open to parallel Claude Agent Teams for independent work streams.

pydantic-settings 2.x: CORS_ORIGINS must be JSON array. Single .env in project root, symlinked from backend/.env. Main DB: PostgreSQL localhost:5432/dashboard_interface_data. VITE_API_URL: src/lib/config.ts appends /api/v1. DealStage enum: 6-stage. Alembic requires PYTHONPATH=. from backend dir. Zod 4.3.6: .transform() replaces manual transforms. SQLite in tests: no server_default, DateTime(timezone=True), datetime.now(UTC). StrEnum + SQLAlchemy: dealstage lowercase → values_callable. Lazy imports: patch at source module. ThreadPoolExecutor for CPU-bound Excel, sequential DB ops. React Compiler: no setState in useEffect, no ref.current in render. Alembic head: d7d1ad81d3c0 (reminder_dismissals). Prefer stdlib over third-party to avoid CI mypy stubs issues. Reference xlsx formula handling: use pandas read+write (not openpyxl copy+modify). Pre-commit hooks: ruff, ruff-format, mypy — all must pass. React Rules of Hooks: ALL hooks must be called before any conditional returns.

SHAREPOINT EXTRACTION: FILE_PATTERN=.*UW.*Model.*vCurrent.*, CUTOFF_DATE=2024-07-15, excludes Speedboat/vOld. Cell reference: Underwriting_Dashboard_Cell_References.xlsx (1,169 fields across 6 sheets). UW GROUPING PIPELINE: 30 active groups (244 files), 9 Proforma deferred, 2 Asset Mgmt excluded. UW files: /home/mattb/projects/dashboard_interface_project/backend/data/uw_model_files/. PHASE 3: 2 groups need custom references (group_5: 11 fields +2 row offset, group_34: 13 fields +6 row offset). 28 groups use production reference. Canary: 30/30 pass. PHASE 4 API: /grouping/approve/{name}, /grouping/extract-batch, /grouping/extract/{name}, /grouping/conflict-check, /grouping/validate.

MEDIUM: 1) Hardcoded seed market data fallback (src/features/market/hooks/useMarketData.ts:49-55) — remove after DB pipeline confirmed or keep as UX fallback. 2) Activity logging not implemented (deals.py:690) — create ActivityLog model. 3) Export OpenAPI spec to docs/openapi.json. LOW: 4) Docker Compose production config. 5) Hosting setup (Oracle Cloud Free Tier or Hetzner CX22 with Tailscale). FUTURE: Mobile-friendly iOS version, Proforma groups extraction.
